DOC.brief_title: The Comparison With Clinical Impacts Functional Capacity Symptom Improvement According Rhythm Control Patients With Heart Failure Recent Onset Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients Heart failure Atrial fibrillation within 1year ( 20~80 year old ) 2 . LA diameter < 5mm 3 . LVEF 20~49 % 4. patient possible anticoagulation anti arrhythmic drug 5 . Expected survival > 1yr 1 . Impossible anticoagulation anti arrhythmic drug 2. valvular atrial fibrillation ( Mitral valve stenosis , Mitral valve plasty , valve replacement ) 3 . LV ejection fraction < 20 % 4 . Structural cardiac disease 5 . Catheter ablation history AF , maze surgery 6. patient severe medical disease 7 . Impossible anticoagulation anti arrhythmic drug
